item.title: Vercel: Redirect wildcard (nested) paths
item.description: We’re deploying the StarTree developer site, dev.startree.ai, to Vercel, and recently needed to do some redirects of a few pages. I initially added individual redirects for each page, but there were eventually too many pages and I wanted to automate it. In this post we’ll learn how to do that. Figure 1. Vercel: Redirect wildcard (nested) paths We wanted to redirect everything under https://dev.startree.ai/docs/thirdeye to https://dev.startree.ai/docs/startree-enterprise-edition/startree-thirdeye/ and started off by using wild card path matching, as seen in the vercel.
